segments.text: This kitchen is a ticking time bomb, I swear.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely oblivious to the rising water at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That puddle is just getting larger and larger, making the floor so dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone is definitely going to slip and fall, I can feel it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then there are the children, teetering on that wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move and the boy will come crashing down, likely taking the cookie jar with him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of broken glass and a bruised child fills me with dread.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a combination of small, unnoticed details leading to potential catastrophe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to shout and alert everyone to the dangers.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: All these risks are converging in one small space.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The innocent actions of everyone are about to lead to something unfortunate.
segments.speaker: PAR
